# The `BayesianMCPmod` package

Simulate, analyze, and evaluate Bayesian MCPMod trials with normally and
binary distributed endpoints.

## Installation

Install the package from CRAN using

`{r} install.packages("BayesianMCPMod")`

The development version can be installed from this repository.

`{r} # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("https://github.com/Boehringer-Ingelheim/BayesianMCPmod")`

## Documentation

The package documentation is hosted
[here](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`assessDesign()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/assessDesign.md)
  : assessDesign
- [`getBootstrapQuantiles()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getBootstrapQuantiles.md)
  : getBootstrapQuantiles
- [`getBootstrapSamples()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getBootstrapSamples.md)
  : getBootstrapSamples
- [`getContr()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getContr.md)
  : getContr
- [`getCritProb()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getCritProb.md)
  : getCritProb
- [`getESS()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getESS.md)
  : getESS
- [`getMED()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getMED.md)
  : getMED
- [`getModelFits()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getModelFits.md)
  : getModelFits
- [`getPosterior()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/getPosterior.md)
  : getPosterior
- [`performBayesianMCP()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/performBayesianMCP.md)
  : performBayesianMCP
- [`performBayesianMCPMod()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/performBayesianMCPMod.md)
  : performBayesianMCPMod
- [`plot(`*`<modelFits>`*`)`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/plot.modelFits.md)
  : plot.modelFits
- [`predict(`*`<modelFits>`*`)`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/predict.modelFits.md)
  : predict.modelFits
- [`simulateData()`](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/reference/simulateData.md)
  : simulateData

# Articles

### Get started

- [Trial Analysis Example of Bayesian MCPMod for Continuous
  Data](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/articles/analysis_normal.md):
- [Trial Analysis Example of Bayesian MCPMod for Binary
  Data](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/articles/binary_endpoint.md):
- [Trial Simulation Example of Bayesian MCPMod for Continuous
  Data](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/articles/Simulation_Example.md):
- [Trial Simulation Example of Bayesian MCPMod for Binary
  Data](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/articles/Simulation_Example_Binary.md):
- [Comparison of Bayesian MCPMod and
  MCPMod](https://boehringer-ingelheim.github.io/BayesianMCPMod/articles/Simulation_Comparison.md):
